casebody.data:
Robert TORRES, Petitioner,
v.
BOARD OF TRUSTEES, STATE POLICE RETIREMENT SYSTEM, Respondent. M-1134 Sept. Term 2018
082791 Supreme Court of New Jersey. June 21, 2019

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion of the State Troopers Non-Commissioned Officers Association and State Troopers Superior Officers Association for leave to appear amicus curiae is granted.
